articles.author: Rebecca Falconer
articles.title: Trump to host UFC fight at White House as part of "America250" celebrations - Axios
articles.description: It's going to be a "championship fight, full fight," Trump said during a rally in Iowa this evening.
articles.content:
• The president's links to the Ultimate Fighting Championship date back to at least 2001, when the since-closed Trump Taj Mahal hosted the mixed martial arts enterprise.
